subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees had no hits through seven innings, but Alex Rodriguez’s R.B.I. double and Slade Heathcott’s three-run homer led to a win that cut their A.L. East deficit to three games.
snippet: The Yankees had no hits through seven innings, but Alex Rodriguez’s R.B.I. double and Slade Heathcott’s three-run homer led to a win that cut their A.L. East deficit to three games.
